description:
Please join us at the final Bristol Data Scientists Meetup of 2017 for three great presentations and networking drinks!

Agenda:

6:00pm: Arrival and drinks

6:30pm: Presentations (followed by networking and drinks)

• Speaker #1: Project templating for Data Science: A route to consistent yet flexible delivery - Chris Musselle, Mango Solutions

• Speaker #2: When product management meets data science: lessons from a small startup - Matt Wright, Techstars

• Speaker #3: Election Forecasting 101: Why are UK elections so hard to predict? - John Sandall, Art of Inference

Join us on Twitter with the Bristol Data Scientists hashtag: #BristolDS
title: Bristol Data Scientists Meeting
